long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Data for Science (D4S) Project at the Institute for Quantitative Social Science at Harvard University allows you to advance social scientific research in the public interest by donating your data footprints on sites like Facebook and YouTube. In a time when most of your personal data is locked away in private companies, our mission is to empower social scientists at leading institutions like Harvard University to safely and securely conduct research in the public interest. The current version of the extension allows users to share their YouTube data directly with the D4S project. Learn more at https://projects.iq.harvard.edu/dataforscience.
